artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude Lorraine delt. / No. 50 | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. June 1. 1807, by Messrs. Boydell & Co. 90. title: Study of a House in an Open Country
